survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Autonomous Vehicle Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights into consumer preferences and concerns regarding autonomous vehicle features to guide future developments in the automotive industry.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with autonomous vehicle technology?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity levels.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with autonomous vehicle technology?

questions.question_text: Which of the following autonomous vehicle features are most important to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following autonomous vehicle features are most important to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about autonomous vehicles?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to capture detailed responses.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about autonomous vehicles?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to purchase or use an autonomous vehicle in the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure purchase intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to purchase or use an autonomous vehicle in the next 5 years?

questions.question_text: What price premium, if any, would you be willing to pay for autonomous features in a vehicle?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent selects 'Very likely' or 'Somewhat likely' in Q4.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to assess price sensitivity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with conditional routing.

script.question_text: What price premium, if any, would you be willing to pay for autonomous features in a vehicle?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent selects 'Very likely' or 'Somewhat likely' in Q4.
